summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of GitHub Portfolio Analyzer. All core features working correctly including AI-powered analysis, GitHub API integration, and responsive frontend.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint (/api/) returns correct message
POST /api/analyze successfully analyzes valid GitHub users (torvalds, octocat)
GitHub URL format parsing works correctly (extracts username from full URLs)
Error handling for non-existent users returns 404 status
Request validation returns 422 for malformed requests
Landing page loads with proper branding and styling
GitHub username/URL input field accepts both formats
Analyze button triggers API call and shows loading state
Analysis results page displays all required components
Overall score (0-100) displayed prominently with color coding
Score breakdown shows all 6 categories (documentation, code structure, activity, organization, impact, technical depth)
Strengths, weaknesses, and recommendations sections populated
Profile information (avatar, bio, stats) shown correctly
Back button navigates to landing page correctly
Invalid username error handling works properly
Toast notifications for success and error states
success_percentage: Backend: 100% (6/6 tests passed), Frontend: 100% (all UI components and flows working)
